main event: A luminous disc-shaped object was sighted over the Andes Mountains near Lima, Peru by a USAF-P pilot on August 15, 1951.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 40-50 feet in diameter and was visible for 3-5 minutes.
The object was sighted again on August 16 in the Callao, Peru area and was visible for about 30 minutes, descending from 13,000 feet to 8,000-9,000 feet before disappearing.
The sighting was reported in a Lima daily newspaper, which included a photograph of the object.
The object was described as luminous and disc-shaped.
The report states that the object was seen by an Air Force pilot, indicating a credible witness.
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph
